transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: IndiaMART se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji ji IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu, sir.
Executive: Mam, maine Shiv Machine Ahmedabad se ek machine purchase kiya tha through IndiaMART.
Customer: But mam, sales after service ke liye woh log phone uthate nahi hai mera.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Toh maine last IndiaMART se IndiaMART se usse bhi call kiya tha.
Customer: Toh unko IndiaMART ke through number mila hua hai.
Customer: But woh bhi receive nahi kiya unhone.
Executive: Achha, ek baar aap apni company ka naam bataiye sir?
Customer: Mam, meri company ka naam hai Azizia Developers.
Executive: Sorry sir?
Customer: Azizia Developers.
Customer: Main khud bhi IndiaMART pe as a seller registered hu.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Ji. Toh maine ek sticker labeling machine purchase kiya tha Shiv Machine Ahmedabad se.
Executive: Achha, fir?
Customer: Mam, ab woh sales sales after service ke liye na toh call receive karte hai, na koi support woh karwa rahe hai.
Executive: Achha, yeh problem aa raha hai. Udhar se jo jo seller hai woh call receive nahi kar rahe hai aapka, hai na?
Customer: Woh call receive bhi nahi kar rahe hai aur na service provide kara rahe hai.
Customer: Jo bhi machine ko technical machine mein dikkat aa rahi hai uska bhi resolve nahi karwa rahe mera.
Executive: Okay okay, main dekhti hu sir ek baar. Ek baar aap fir se dobara se apni company ka naam bata dijiye mujhe?
Customer: Azizia Developers. Jo registered mobile number hai IndiaMART ke upar woh number batau kya main aapko?
Executive: Ha ha, wahi number bata dijiye aap mujhe.
Customer: 6263
Executive: 6263
Customer: 482900
Executive: 482900
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay. Fir main check karti hu ek baar. Thik hai, main aapko dobara contact karti hu.
Customer: Okay mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer purchased a machine through IndiaMART.

- Seller not answering calls for after-sales service.

- No service or support being provided.

- Technical issues with the machine not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.

- Executive asked for company name and registered number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will contact the customer again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- machine, service, support, seller, call
